description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Cute or Trash Mode, single, 2-players or Death Match, Hop and Pop is "Some fun for smart people". Jump around and push balloons or Zombies ‘heads to make color combinations. Unless you prefer to pick-up surprises and unlock one of the 15 Powers.  It's up to you Features:  single, 2 players or Death-Match. Cute or Trash Mode, 3 Difficulty, 4  Soundtracks, 15 awards
